overview:
After more than 12 years in Publishing world, from Deputy Editor to Publisher, then founder & CEO for several magazines in France, including licencing negociations, Fred Bonelli has switched to the digital world, especially the Internet, and using his experience in Content Distribution he founded the Spinmedias start-up in April 2008 with Cyri Vart (FaberNovel), StÃ©phane Distinguin (FaberNovel) and Xavier Laumonier, and created SpinSystem : the first ‘Intelligent Multicanal Datas & Content Managment System’, which helps retail brands to manage their Retail Communication.

The Start-up has been bought by Altavia Group in dec. 2009.

Fred Bonelli is now CEO of Altavia Spindigital, and manage the top team including Alexandre Hoyau, founder of SilexOpen Source C.M.S, which is gonna be the new base used for Spinsystem v1.3 future release (july 2010).

2 digital disruptives personnal projects are coming end of 2010…
